title: Hogwarts Legacy
text: *carriage flies over the clouds*
George Osric: Glad I caught you before you left for Scotland.
Professor Fig: Just barely.
George Osric: *laughs* And who is your travelling companion?
Professor Fig: A new student.
George Osric: New? *looks surprised*
Player: Yes, sir. I'm starting school as a fifth-year.
George Osric: How extraordinary.
Professor Fig: It is, indeed. None of the faculty has ever heard of anyone being admitted to Hogwarts so late.
George Osric: Not have I.
Professor Fig: Of course, as the other fifth-years will have been honing their magical skills for four years now,
the Headmaster asked if I could get our new student up to speed a bit before the term begins.
George Osric: Well, you couldn't have asked for a better mentor.
George Osric: Professor Fig is not only an exceptional teacher, he is also a remarkably intuative - and gifted - wizard.
Professor Fig: Mr Osric is prone to flattery. I daresay it's one of the reasons he's risen so far at the Ministry. *chuckles*
*George pulls a copy of the Daily Prophet*
George Osric: Have you seen this?
*A newspaper article regarding Ranrok and a goblin rebellion*
Professor Fig: I have. Opinions differ as to how great a threat Ranrok really is.
*you notice something in the clouds out of the carriage window. It worries you.*
George Osric: Although I've yet to convince my colleagues at the Ministry, I believe he is a significant threat.
George Osric: And it was your wife, Eleazar, who alerted me to his activities months ago.
George Osric: Miriam? How?
George Osric: *sigh* She wrote to me about Ranrok before she died - wondering what the Ministry knew about his activities.
George Osric: Before I could respond, I recieved this. It was the last thing she sent me, Eleazar.
*George pulls some sort of container out of his pocket with strange embellishment*
George Osric: It came via her owl - but with no correspondence. I can only assume -
Professor Fig: *takes the container from George* - that she had to het rid of it quickly to keep it safe.
George Osric: Presumably from Ranrok.
